sentences.sContent: Violent storms wreaked havoc on the French Riviera, leaving three people dead and dozens injured.
sentences.sCn: 强风暴对法国里维埃拉造成严重破坏，致使3人死亡、数十人受伤。

remMethod.val: 到处乱发脾气(wreak)是脆弱(weak)的表现

trans.tranCn: 发泄；报仇；造成（巨大的破坏或伤害）
trans.tranOther: Something or someone that wreaks havoc or destruction causes a great amount of disorder or damage
